chapters.title: Chapter 3:  The Peddler
chapters.info: Padan Fain, p. 27—Pale skinny peddler with gangly arms and a huge beak of a nose that comes to Emond's Field about once a year. He always smiles and laughs as if he knows some joke no one else knows. He came just before Bel Tine to trade, and brought news of the war in Ghealdan against the false Dragon.
